stutter.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to speak with difficulty because you cannot stop yourself from repeating the first consonant of some words
stutter.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if a machine stutters, it keeps making little noises and does not work smoothly
stutter.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: a refrigerator which stuttered and hummed
stutter.translation[1].definitions[0].de: an inability to speak normally because you stutter
